body.name: Weiman Cooktop and Stove Top Cleaner Kit - Glass Cook Top Cleaner and Polish 10 oz. Scrubbing Pad, Cleaning Tool, Razor, Scraper
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 41 mins
features: REVITALIZE WITHOUT SCRATCHING: Non-abrasive cooktop pads help easily remove heavily burned on foods, grease & grime. Our cooktop cream uses micro-bead technology to boost cleaning power.
SHINE & PROTECT: Dramatically cleans, shines, and protects glass/ceramic/induction smooth top ranges. Buff with a paper towel to shine.
SAFE & EASY TO USE: Leave a streak-free shine while removing splattered food, dirt, oily residue & watermarks. Will not scratch or damage your cooktop.

USE ON: All major glass/ceramic cooktop manufactures including GE, Whirlpool, Frigidaire & Thermador. TRUSTED BRAND: Weiman is a trusted cleaning brand for most of your home's delicate, difficult to care for surfaces; clean, protect and enjoy your home with Weiman.
3 PIECE SET: This bundle includes (1) Cooktop Cream, (1) Razor – (Razor is packed with the blade flipped inside for safety) and (1) Scrubbing Pad.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Weiman 3-Piece Glass Cooktop Cleaner & Polish Kit Glass cooktops do not have to be hard to keep clean! Weiman's 3 piece glass cooktop cleaner & polish kit has everything you need to keep your cooktop clean, shiny and streak - free! Our best-selling kit includes a 10 Oz bottle of our cleaner & polish, a scraper tool for tough burnt-on food spills, and a scratch-free scrubbing pad! You will LOVE your results, every time.

Cooktop Cleaning Kit Tools - Included in Kit Reusable Scraper Tool For your toughest baked-on messes, you will love using our razor scraper tool! When you open your tool, the razor blade will be turned inwards for safety. Turn the black dial to loosen the blade, flip it outwards and re-tighten the dial. You are ready to go! Reusable Scrub Pad Holder Our kit includes this easy to use scrub pad holder. Simply press the pad on onto the bottom of the holder, and scrub away! The kit comes with (1) pad, and can be re-used for years to come with Weiman Cooktop Scrubbing Pads!

Enhance the natural beauty of cooktop surfaces in your home with the Weiman Glass & Ceramic Cooktop Cleaner & Polish. The Weiman Heavy Duty Glass Cook Top Cleaner & Polish is engineered with a streak-free, non-abrasive formula to clean, shine & protect all glass/ceramic cooktop, countertop & bar surfaces without scratching or damaging your appliances. The Weiman Glass Cook Top Cleaner & Polish is a cleaning cream designed with a gentle, yet effective formula that safely cleans up stubborn stains, splattered food & greasy, oily residue to revitalize and maintain your surfaces that keeps your kitchen shining brighter and longer.

Will this cleaner leave streaks on my glass cooktop? No - Our cooktop cream will leave a streak-free shine that you will be so happy with! For best results, we recommend buffing with a dry paper towel or micro-fiber cloth after youre done cleaning. Will the scrubbing pad damage or scratch my glass cooktop? No - Our cooktop pads are carefully designed to gently but effectively scrub your surface, removing tough burnt-on spills and baked-on food. The cooktop pads, when used as directed will not scratch or harm your surface!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a great job!
reviews.reviewText: I have a Frigidaire glass cooktop stove and this product did a very good job in removing baked on stains/spots. However, I agree with another customer about the blade that comes with the kit. Only use it very lightly, it can scratch the surface. I would buy this product again because works well and is fast and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glass top stove cleaner
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product. It does a great job of keeping my glass top stove clean and the scrub brush that’s provided and the single edge razor blade that has a handle makes it very easy to scrape off anything that spilled over and needs to be scraped off before you put the cream on put the cream on with the scrub brush that they give you rub it around it does a great job of cleaning up all of the residue from whatever you were cooking and then just wipe it off with the damp cloth, and it looks like brand new, we’ve ordered this a couple times before I will continue to order it as it does a great job for my needs. Also found that it works on my gas fireplace. That’s a sealed unit when I takeoff the the front I can clean it with the same cream and also the inside of my oven door so it’s got a lot of excuses . Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved Me and My Rental Stove
reviews.reviewText: I made the huge mistake of putting water to boil and then getting caught up in a work call. My copper kettle boiled dry and some of the metal left a film on the glass top stove. I did an online search and found most information said this would be a permanent mark - not good, especially in a rental situation. Thankfully one poster mentioned Weiman Cooktop and Stove Top Cleaner had worked for them so I ordered it. It worked! It took a fair amount of elbow grease and patience to work off one layer at a time, but within about an hour I was able to get all the metal film off without damaging the stove top. The pads and scarper worked great. I found it went faster when I let the paste sit a bit before trying to scrub it off. There is no mark left, which is way more than I hoped for. This stuff really works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with the turn out
reviews.reviewText: My glass stop top looks shiny now. It was dull with burned food stains. This really helped put a little sparkle back into the stove top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes a real difference
reviews.reviewText: I can’t recommend this product enough. This is my first glass top stove. I did not know it required such care to maintain. This polish/cleaner works words on food and ward cooked to the range. I use this at least once a week and use their daily cleaner EVERY day. The cleaning pad is great for scrubbing stuck on stains and it dries really quickly; however once you have rubbed this off, the shine is back without a scratch. Keeping the scrubbing pad clean is tricky but I love that it leaves no scratches on your top. This brand is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is made with magic.
reviews.reviewText: Seriously, I’ve never seen my glass cooktop so clean. It rivals when it was new. And it was super easy to clean, barely any elbow grease required. WILL BUY AGAIN.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my glass top stove!
reviews.reviewText: This glass top stove cleaner set is perfect. I have a white glass top that gets dirty ridiculously quick. It’s absurd. And because food gets stuck on there so easily, I really needed something rough enough to unstick the gunk, but gentle enough not to scratch up my stove top (esp cuz im in a rental!). This set of cleaning supplies is just right.I will first wipe my stove down with a wet paper towel. I’ll then use the cleaner (a little goes a long way), and I’ll scrub it with the sponge/brush provided. If for some reason that still doesn’t get everything up (which will happen with stoves like this), then I will take the little edge cutter/knife provided and scrape up any remaining bits. After that, I spray it with regular disinfectant as a finishing touch. Works like a charm!I found that if you leave the sponge/brush in a large cup with hot water and dish soap (covering the whole sponge), it’s good as new by morning! At first I wasn’t sure how to clean it because NOTHING comes off of it when you rinse it under water. But soaking it works! Simple. Worth it.Great product, true to description, and easy to use. Def recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well on Glass top stoves.
reviews.reviewText: Weiman makes great furniture products, so I decided to try this for my cooktop (which is a pain to clean). The product and the accessories make it pretty easy to clean the cooktop back to its original shine. I'd definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really good, works like a charm on burnt food
reviews.reviewText: This product honestly worked really well, see my before and after! My stove top was already scratched up on the left but it took off all the burnt food!!! Miracle worker! The pink stuff didn’t even come close to this.
Excelente producto ayudo mucho a la limpieza y la navaja funciona bastante bien para remover las manchas de grasa quemada
Makes miracles in the kitchen. Will buy more.
I have been using this product to clean my glass top oven and it works amazing. Cuts the greaae and leaves the oven shinning as new
